overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Setsuna is a real-time text sharing application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data responsibly.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect minimal data necessary for the service:
items: Text messages you share within rooms

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: All data is automatically deleted after 24 hours. Rooms and their messages are permanently removed from our servers after this period. We do not retain any backup copies of deleted data.

thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services:

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Setsuna, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Setsuna provides real-time text sharing between devices using 6-character room codes. All rooms and messages are automatically deleted after 24 hours.

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.content: You agree not to use Setsuna for:
items: Sharing illegal content or engaging in illegal activities
Distributing malware, viruses, or harmful code
Any activity that violates applicable laws or regulations

noGuarantee.title: No Guarantee
noGuarantee.content: Setsuna is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:

dataExpiration.title: Data Expiration
dataExpiration.content: All rooms and messages are automatically deleted after 24 hours. This is a core feature of the service and cannot be changed. Do not use Setsuna for storing important data.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this service, including but not limited to data loss, service interruption, or unauthorized access to your content.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
